cleaned_text: Meditation Tunic Slip out of everyday stress and into comfort with our Meditation Tunic. This relaxed tunic features a lightweight hood and overlapping neckline. Large crescent pockets are perfect for your phone, wallet, and any other essentials. Made with [Spiritex's 100% Organic Cotton Lightweight Jersey](https://fabric.spiritex.net/collections/organic-cotton-lightweight-jersey), this piece is soft to the touch and breathable so you can unwind and decompress from your busy day. Features Large patch pockets Hood with overlapping neckline A-line tunic silhouette Long sleeves Double needle hem Fit Details Fits true to size Loose, relaxed fit Hits at top of thigh Expect 5% shrinkage in garment length if machine washed hot & dried Content & Care 100% Organic Cotton Grown & sewn in the USA Colored with non-toxic, low-impact dyes Machine wash cold, tumble dry low For best results, wash with sulfate-free soap. No bleach Styling Tip Layer over our [Yoga Capri ](https://www.ashevilleapparel.net/search?type=product&q=*yoga%20capri*)to be super comfy during your meditation or yoga practice.
